text:
Smilja Avramov (15 February 1918 – 2 October 2018) was a Serbian academic, authority and educator. She worked in international law. She was a member of the Senate of Republika Srpska from 1996 to 2009.
Avramov was a professor of international law at the Law Faculty at Belgrade University. She turned 100 in February 2018.
Avramov died at her apartment in Belgrade on 2 October 2018 from congestive heart failure at the age of 100.
